name: Escape (itch) (ReonPG)
description:
____________________________________

Description

You wake up, locked inside of a cage... You need to get out!

Escape is a horror-themed game, in which you play a little girl who has been locked up, but doesn't know who did it, or why... You will need to explore the room to find clues in order to solve puzzles that will help you escape. Careful though... he is watching you

____________________________________

Controls
  • Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Interact -  Z

____________________________________

Features
  • Exploration
  • Puzzle-Solving

____________________________________
